notes: [improved] Now using Guzzle for API calls.
[improved] API calls are cached for up to ten minutes.
[added] Included the ability to set webhook email address in plugin settings.
[improved] Email notification now has its own template.
[added] Webhook can now decrement specific quantities from order stocks.
Renamed .html templates to .twig for selfish (code highlighting) reasons.
[added] Added webhook validation so only Snipcart is able to trigger webhooks.
[improved] Added proper pagination to order listing.
[added] New JSON release log, so you can now be annoyed by updates.
[fixed] Unimplemented webhook events respond with 200 status rather than 400.
